mapper.select: select * from TBL_MEMBER where EMAIL = #{email} and PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_MEMBER (member_no, member_type_cd, email, password, nickname, phonenumber, address, joindate, isactivated, sns) values (seq_member_no.nextval, 102, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phonenumber}, #{address}, sysdate, 'Y', #{sns})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where member_no = #{member_no} and board_category_cd = 201 order by board_no desc

select b.board_no, b.member_no, b.product_id, b.nickname, b.regdate, b.upddate, b.content, p.name as title, b.mainimage from tbl_board b join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id where member_no = #{member_no} and board_category_cd = 203 order by board_no desc
